Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Il 
    Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the diplomatic corps to the DPRK on the threshold of the New Year Juche 94 (2005).
 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were handed to DPRK Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun today by Ahmed Amer Al Muakaff, secretary of the People's Bureau of Libya, on behalf of the corps.

articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Outgoing Libyan Diplomat 
    Pyongyang, December 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, had a conversation with Ahmed Amer Al Muakaff, secretary of the People's Bureau of Libya to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Tuesday.
 On hand was Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs Choe Su Hon.
